title: Account Settings
description: Manage your account information and preferences
accountDescription: Manage your account settings and email
securityDescription: Manage your password and security settings
updateNameDescription: Change your first and last name
updateEmailDescription: Change your email address. You'll need to verify your password.
changePasswordDescription: Update your password. Make sure it's at least 8 characters long.
nameUpdatedSuccess: Your name has been updated successfully
nameUpdatedError: Failed to update your name. Please try again.
emailUpdatedSuccess: Your email has been updated successfully
emailUpdatedError: Failed to update your email. Please check your password and try again.
passwordChangedSuccess: Your password has been changed successfully
passwordChangedError: Failed to change your password. Please check your current password and try again.
sessionExpired: Your session has expired. Please sign in again.
